title: Crewekerne Families in Action
content:
Greater Albion Typefoubders have just published some more examples of the three newly released Crewekerne familes in use. You can see these example images on their [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013222502/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). In the meantime here's one of the images published:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013222502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sammys_4601.png)
author: Rasendyll

comments.content: Wow. You really, really need to buy a copy of _Photoshop for Dummies_.
